original_text: The city was laid out like a square, as long as it was wide. He measured the city with the rod and found it to be 12,000 stadia in length, and as wide and high as it is long.
korean_text: 그 성은 네모가 반듯하여 길이와 너비가 같은지라 그 갈대 자로 그 성을 측량하니 만 이천 스다디온이요 길이와 너비와 높이가 같더라

sentences.original_text: The city was laid out like a square
as long as it was wide
He measured the city with the rod
and found it to be 12,000 stadia in length
and as wide and high as it is long
